########################################################################
# Setup library
########################################################################
include(GrPlatform) #define LIB_SUFFIX

## external protobuf & boost
	find_package(Boost REQUIRED)
	if(NOT Boost_FOUND)
	     message(FATAL_ERROR "Fatal error: Boost required.")
	endif()

	find_package(Protobuf REQUIRED)
	if(${Protobuf_VERSION} VERSION_LESS "3.0.0")
	     message(FATAL_ERROR "Fatal error: Protocol Buffers > v3.0.0 required.")
	endif()

	include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

	protobuf_generate_cpp(PROTO_SRCS_SYNC PROTO_HDRS_SYNC gnss_synchro.proto)

## continuing


list(APPEND gnsssdr_mod_sources
    de_serializer_impl.cc
    gnss_synchro_udp_source.cc
    ${PROTO_SRCS_SYNC}
)

set(gnsssdr_mod_sources "${gnsssdr_mod_sources}" PARENT_SCOPE)
if(NOT gnsssdr_mod_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ sources... skipping lib/")
    return()
endif(NOT gnsssdr_mod_sources)

add_library(gnuradio-gnsssdr_mod SHARED ${gnsssdr_mod_sources})
target_link_libraries(gnuradio-gnsssdr_mod PUBLIC gnuradio::gnuradio-runtime Boost::boost protobuf::libprotobuf)
target_include_directories(gnuradio-gnsssdr_mod
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../include>
    PUBLIC $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:include>
  )
set_target_properties(gnuradio-gnsssdr_mod PROPERTIES DEFINE_SYMBOL "gnuradio_gnsssdr_mod_EXPORTS")

if(APPLE)
    set_target_properties(gnuradio-gnsssdr_mod PROPERTIES
        INSTALL_NAME_DIR "${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib"
    )
endif(APPLE)

########################################################################
# Install built library files
########################################################################
include(GrMiscUtils)
GR_LIBRARY_FOO(gnuradio-gnsssdr_mod)

########################################################################
# Print summary
########################################################################
message(STATUS "Using install prefix: ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}")
message(STATUS "Building for version: ${VERSION} / ${LIBVER}")

########################################################################
# Build and register unit test
########################################################################
include(GrTest)

# If your unit tests require special include paths, add them here
#include_directories()
# List all files that contain Boost.UTF unit tests here
list(APPEND test_gnsssdr_mod_sources
)
# Anything we need to link to for the unit tests go here
list(APPEND GR_TEST_TARGET_DEPS gnuradio-gnsssdr_mod)

if(NOT test_gnsssdr_mod_sources)
    MESSAGE(STATUS "No C++ unit tests... skipping")
    return()
endif(NOT test_gnsssdr_mod_sources)

foreach(qa_file ${test_gnsssdr_mod_sources})
    GR_ADD_CPP_TEST("gnsssdr_mod_${qa_file}"
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/${qa_file}
    )
endforeach(qa_file)
